ComicInfo.Title: Absolute Darkness
ComicInfo.Summary: This is a glimpse into the future, where all light has been extinguished, where absolute darkness reigns supreme. A vision where Estacado will embrace once again his power, losing what's left of human inside him. But it is also a glimpse to the ultimate fate of our planet and The Darkness end.But how much of this vision will become truth and what will happen with Jackie with this fear that now resides where his soul used to be.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 07:24:49. [CVDB151819]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Chaz Riggs, Dale Keown, Frazer Irving, Joe Benitez, Jorge Lucas, Lee Carter, Marc Silvestri, Matt Timson, Michael Broussard, Ryan Sook, Steve Firchow, Stjepan Šejić
ComicInfo.Inker: Chaz Riggs, Joe Weems, Ryan Winn
ComicInfo.Colorist: Benny Fuentes, Dale Keown, Dave McCaig, Edgar Delgado, Felix Serrano, Steve Firchow
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dale Keown, Grant Goleash, Joe Weems, Lee Bermejo, Michael Broussard, Steve Firchow, Stjepan Šejić
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State
